mapper.select: select b.id, b.title, b.content, b.author, b.at_created_time, b.at_updated_time, b.is_deleted from Board b join Reply r on b.id = r.board where b.is_deleted = false and b.id = #{id}
select b.id, b.title, b.content, b.author, b.at_created_time, b.at_updated_time, b.is_deleted from Board b join Reply r on b.id = r.board where b.is_deleted = false
mapper.insert: insert into Board(title, content, author, at_created_time, at_updated_time) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{member.id}, now(), now())
mapper.delete: delete from Board b where b.id = #{id}
